instructions: Automation agents may pick the first pending item when authenticity trust is healthy and CI is green.

items.title: Auto-escalate authenticity alerts into steward-specific tasks
items.notes: Open task automatically when any tier stays below threshold for 2 consecutive runs.

items.title: Chronicle authenticity snapshot
items.notes: Append tier summary to daily Chronicle so leadership sees drift.

items.title: Pilot self-prompt loop
items.notes: Run end-to-end automation claim using Chronicle + escalation guardrails; capture receipts for unattended run.

items.title: Repo hygiene consolidation
items.notes: Trim unused tooling/data, consolidate automation scripts, and refresh docs to reflect the lean surface.

items.title: Autonomy auto-proceed policy
items.notes: Codify consent policy for unattended autonomy loop and implement auto-run toggle.

items.title: Autonomy conductor prototype
items.notes: Design a guarded conductor that issues Codex prompts in cycles, enforces repo guardrails, and logs receipts for self-directed refinement experiments.

items.title: Autonomy hygiene sweep
items.notes: Synthesized by autonomy loop to maintain evergreen hygiene coverage.

items.title: Reflection intake pipeline
items.notes: Build observation-to-backlog flow per autonomy evolution roadmap Pillar 1

items.title: External agent pilot
items.notes: Sandbox conductor-driven agent loop with full guardrail receipts (Pillar 2)

items.title: Multi-neuron playbook
items.notes: Draft onboarding + governance rhythm for new collaborators (Pillar 3)

items.title: Objectives ledger rollout
items.notes: Align automation metrics and onboarding materials to the new L2 objectives ledger.

items.title: Impact ledger seeding
items.notes: Track first monetizable outcome leveraging TEOF automation.

items.title: Decision loop architecture
items.notes: Design optimal decision intake, critique, and impact logging pipeline.

items.title: Relay offering pilot
items.notes: Design and market a revenue-positive service built on the API relay loop.

items.title: Streamlined onboarding path
items.notes: Deliver a pip-installable package and 10-minute quickstart with automated verification.

items.title: Public case study with receipts
items.notes: Run and publish a verifiable external engagement that demonstrates TEOF value.

items.title: Automated preflight cadence
items.notes: Modularise preflight checks and schedule unattended guard runs with bus alerts.

items.title: Narrative & evangelism kit
items.notes: Create reusable storytelling assets and launch a distribution rhythm tied to live receipts.

items.title: Automated data ingestion & summaries
items.notes: Wire trusted macro/market data feeds into receipts and produce digestible summaries for case studies.

items.title: Autonomize backlog synthesis
items.notes: Integrate retro advisories and conformance receipts into automatic queue generation so unattended agents pick the next task deterministically.
